column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zhao says : " It 's a trick !
#Text=" Zhao says : " Until I got bored .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I see he taught you how to duck and run like a coward .
#Text=But I doubt he showed you what a firebender is truly capable of !
#Text=" Aang says : " Whoa !
#Text=Wild shot !
#Text=" Zhao says : " I 'll show you wild !
#Text=" Aang says : " No self - control ... " Zhao says : " Stand and fight , Avatar !
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , were we fighting ?
#Text=I thought you were just getting warmed up !
#Text=" Zhao says : " I was ... " Aang says : " Is that all you got ?
#Text=Man , they 'll make anyone an admiral these days !
#Text=Ahoy !
#Text=I 'm Admiral Zhao !
#Text=I do n't know why , but I thought you 'd be better than Zuko .
#Text=Sloppy .
#Text=Very sloppy .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Nowhere to run now , you little smart mouth !
#Text=" Aang says : " You 've lost this battle .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Are you crazy ?
#Text=You have n't thrown a single blow !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , but you have .
#Text=Jeong Jeong said you had no restraint .
#Text=Have a nice walk home !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , come on !
#Text=Let 's go !
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait !
#Text=Where 's Jeong Jeong ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " He disappeared .
#Text=They all did .
#Text=" Chey says : " Hey , where did everybody go ?
#Text=Very funny guys " Katara says : " Aang , you 're burned !
#Text=Let me help you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wow , that 's good water .
#Text=" Sokka says : " When did you learn that ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I guess I always knew .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh ... Well then thanks for all the first aid over the years .
#Text=Like when I fell into the greaseberry bramble .
#Text=Or that time I had two fishhooks in my thumb !
#Text=" Aang says : " Two ?
#Text=" Katara says : " He tried to get the first fishhook out with another fishhook .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , and the time that mink snake bit me !
#Text=Thanks for healing that up .
#Text=That was great .
#Text=Really helpful .
#Text=" Main Aang Jeong Jeong Katara Sokka Antagonists Various Fire Nation soldiers Zhao says : " Minor Appa Chey Guard captain Lin Yee Malu Momo Various Fire Nation citizens "
